item.title: End US-491 North at US-191
item.description: End US-491 north at US-191 in Monticello. US-491 is former highway US-666, and runs from Gallup, New Mexico to Monticello, Utah. This is the northern terminus of US-491.

item.title: End US-491 at US-191
item.description: End US-491 at US-191. Use US-191 north for Moab; US-191 south for Blanding.

item.title: US-491 North - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on US-491 north at the Colorado-Utah Border. Also entering San Juan County.

item.title: US-491 North at CO-184
item.description: US-491 North at CO-184 in Montezuma County.

item.title: US-160 West at US-491
item.description: US-160 west at US-491. Merge right for US-491 north. Continue straight for US-491 South/US-160 West. US-491 South joins US-160 West. Use US-160 West/US-491 North for Weigh and Check Station.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching I-40/NM-602
item.description: US-491 south approaching I-40 to Albuquerque and Flagstaff (Arizona). US-491 ends at I-40, and turns into NM-602 towards Zuni.

item.title: US-491 South at NM-264
item.description: US-491 south at NM-264. Use left lane for US-491 south; right lane for NM-264 west.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching NM-264
item.description: US-491 south approaching NM-264 west to Window Rock.

item.title: US-491 South at US-64
item.description: US-491 south at US-64. US-491 south joins US-64 through Shiprock.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching US-64
item.description: US-491 south approaching US-64. Turn right for US-64 West/US-491 south; left for US-64 east.

item.title: US-491 South - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome To New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-491 south. Taken at the Colorado - New Mexico state line.

item.title: US-160 East at US-491
item.description: US-160 east at US-491. Turn left to continue east on US-160. US-160 joins US-491 east to Cortez.

item.title: US-160 East at US-491
item.description: US-160 east at US-491. Turn right for US-491 south to Shiprock, New Mexico. Turn left for US-491 north and US-160 east to Cortez. US-160 joins US-491 north to Cortez.

item.title: US-491 South at US-160 East
item.description: US-491 South at US-160 East to Durango.

item.title: US-491 South at US-160
item.description: US-491 south at US-160. Turn left for US-160 east to Durango. Continue ahead for US-160 West/US-491 South. Use US-160 west for Four Corners; use US-491 south for Shiprock, New Mexico. US-160 west joins US-491 southbound to the Four Corners area.

item.title: US-491 South at CO-184
item.description: US-491 south at CO-184 east to Dolores. Continue south on US-491 to Cortez.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching CO-184
item.description: US-491 South approaching CO-184 east.

item.title: US-491 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-491 south just past the CO-141 junction. Distance to Dove Creek and Cortez.

item.title: US-491 South at CO-141 North
item.description: US-491 South at CO-141 North in Dolores County.

item.title: US-491 South Approaching CO-141
item.description: US-491 South approaching CO-141 north to Egnar and Naturita. Continue south on US-491 for Dove Creek.

item.title: Welcome To Colorado - US-491 South
item.description: Welcome To Colorado on US-491 South. Taken at the Utah-Colorado state line.

item.title: US-491 South - Dolores County
item.description: Dolores County on US-491 south. The Colorado welcome sign can be seen in the background. Taken at the Utah-Colorado state line.

item.title: US-491 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-491 south. Distance to Cortez and Mesa Verde National Park (both in Colorado). Taken on the east side of Monticello.

item.title: US-491 South - Monticello
item.description: US-491 south in Monticello. This is the first US-491 shield on US-491 southbound. US-491 was formerly US-666 until it was renamed in 2003.

item.title: US-191 South at US-491
item.description: US-191 South at US-491. Use US-491 east for Cortez (Colorado); continue south on US-191 for Blanding. This is the northern end of US-491. Also US-491 east for the (Utah) Port of Entry.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching US-491
item.description: US-191 south approaching US-491 east. US-491 is a north-south highway, but is signed as an east-west highway in Utah.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching US-491
item.description: US-191 south approaching US-491 east. Use US-491 south for Cortez (Colorado); continue south on US-491 for Blanding.

item.title: NM-118 West at NM-602/US-491
item.description: NM-118 west at Arnold St., to NM-602/Zuni/Ramah and US-491/Shiprock.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 26
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 26 - BL-40/NM-118/E. 66 Ave. The actual exit text is for East Gallup.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 20
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 20 - Downtown Gallup. The advance signs to Exit 20 are much more detailed then the actual exit name, which is Munoz Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 20
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 20 - US-491/NM-602/Shiprock/Zuni. The advance signs to Exit 20 are much more detailed then the actual exit name, which is Munoz Blvd.

item.title: Distance Marker on I-40 East
item.description: Distance marker on I-40 east. Distance to US-491, Gallup, and Albuquerque.

item.title: US-64 East/US-491 North Approaching US-491 Jct.
item.description: US-64 East/US-491 north at split. Use US-491 north for Cortez (CO). Use US-64 east for Farmington.

item.title: US-64 East/US-491 at Split
item.description: US-64 East/US-491 north at split. Turn left for US-491 north.

item.title: US-64 East at US-491
item.description: US-64 east at US-491. Use US-491 south for Gallup. US-491 north joins US-64 through Shiprock.

item.title: US-64 East Approaching US-491
item.description: US-64 east approaching US-491.

item.title: US-64 east at US-491 North
item.description: US-64 east at US-491 junction north in Shiprock.

item.title: US-64 East at US-491 North
item.description: US-64 east at US-491 north to Cortez. Taken in Shiprock.
